    • Constructor Detail

      • Line

        public Line(int dir,
            int x,
            int y,
            int duration,
            int colr,
            int intense,
            int spd)
        Displays a single line based on input parameters
        Parameters:
        dir - Direction (1 to 8 inclusive) 1:up - 2:down - 3:left - 4:right - 5:up+left - 6:up+right - 7:down+left - 8:down+right
        x - Starting X location
        y - Starting Y location
        duration - Duration for which a single pad is lit up
        colr - Color integer value
        intense - Color intensity value
        spd - Speed at which the line moves across

    • Method Detail

      • lineWithDirection

        public static void lineWithDirection(int x,
                                     int y,
                                     int direction,
                                     int duration,
                                     int color)
        Displays a single line based on input parameters
        Parameters:
        x - Starting X location
        y - Starting Y location
        direction - Direction of the animation
        duration - Duration every pad lights up during the animation
        color - Integer value of the color

      • RandomLine

        public static void RandomLine(int x,
                              int y,
                              boolean withDiagonal)
                       throws javax.sound.midi.InvalidMidiDataException,
                              java.lang.InterruptedException
        Calculates random parameters and calls a new line
        Parameters:
        x - X location to initiate the line from
        y - Y location to initiate the line from
        withDiagonal - True if the line should be allowed to be diagonal
        Throws:
        javax.sound.midi.InvalidMidiDataException - Invalid Midi Data Exception
        java.lang.InterruptedException - Thread Interrupted Exception

      • run

        public void run()
        Initiates Thread. Displays the line
